text: The 2016 United States presidential election in Florida was held on 8 November 2016. It was part of the 2016 United States presidential election, in which all other states plus the District of Columbia voted. On 15 March 2016, the state also voted for who they wanted to be the nominee of their respective parties. == Presidential == === Polling === Below is a table with the polling results in Florida. Florida has not voted Republican in the general election since 2008.
